gw.api.messaging

Class MessageDestinationUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.messaging.MessageDestinationUtil

  • public class MessageDestinationUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This exposes some helper methods to gosu to aid in managing the message queue for a specific destination.
    Author:
    dandrews

      • suspend

        public static boolean suspend(int destID,
                              MessageProcessingDirection direction,
                              java.util.Date untilDate)
        This will suspend the specific destination and direction temporarily. This requires a valid date.
        Parameters:
        destID - the destination
        direction - the direction to resume
        untilDate - the time to suspend until
        Returns:
        whether this was accomplished
